name: Block Puzzle Woody Extreme
description:
Block puzzle Extreme is a game that represents simplicity and effectiveness. It won't take you more than a minute to learn, and your mind shall improve with precision and agility.

◉ Able to utilize in-game Hammer, Rotate, Undo to keep playing and beat the new high score.
◉ Available with 4 Modes: Classic, Time, Bomb, Plus.
◉ Able to keep track of your progress and achievements weekly/monthly/yearly through Profile section.

We hope you'll enjoy.
